li.label: Funny drones
li.description: I don't know why, but I keep finding one of our drones doing funny little things.

li.label: Drone kindness
li.description: Every now and then a drone does something unexpectedly... thoughtful? It's nice.

li.label: Amicable drones
li.description: We've got quite a few drones that are very amicable and almost friendly. It's refreshing, but I don't know how many more we really need.
